Text.Page:
Pssssst! I'm observing the enemy. I'm also supposed to be guiding some stranded soldiers from the checkpoint north of here back to a safer place.

Problem is, I can't do both at once. Will you let the checkpoint know that I'll be there as soon as I can? Thanks.
Ah, a federation soldier at last. The rescue team's on the way, right? Do me a favor and inform Prefect Anelle. Just grab the vine and climb straight up.
Well, even if you're not the rescue team, it's good to know they'll be here soon. Anything to create a little hope, you know?
